item.title: Peering Policy
item.description: Peering with us is a good way to reduce latency and bandwidth as you’re directly connected to us and don‚Äôt need to rely on your upstream provider. If you decide to peer with AS197434 you have to follow some basic rules, but don’t worry, they aren’t hard (only a security measure) üòâ Requirements and Rules In the possession of a RIPE assigned ASN and IPv6 prefix Have a valid and up to date PeeringDB profile Don’t under any circumstances point static or default routes towards us A valid RPKI would be useful for validation Connections and Profile FogIXP (AS47498) Our PeeringDB Profile Do not hesitate to contact us, we will answer in 1-3 business days!
